text.en: Kyema! Embodiment of all the Buddhas of the three times,
text.en-trans: kyema dü sum sangye malü düpé ku

text.en: Noble and supreme Avalokiteśvara, the protector of beings,
text.en-trans: drowé gön gyur pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Ārya Tārā who pacifies the eight fears,
text.en-trans: jikgyé zhidzé jetsün pakma drol

text.en: We pray to you with one-pointed devotion.
text.en-trans: dak sok tsechik depé solwa deb

text.en: Look upon us with compassion and grant your blessings.
text.en-trans: tukjé zik la jingyi lob su sol

text.en: Though we’ve obtained the freedoms and advantages of this precious human body,
text.en-trans: daljor milü rinchen tob dü dir

text.en: We fail to apply ourselves to the essence of the sublime Dharma,
text.en-trans: nyingpo dampé chö la mi tsön zhing

text.en: But engage in meaningless, fruitless and non-virtuous actions.
text.en-trans: dönmé tong lok mi gé lé la tsön

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us that this human life becomes meaningful.
text.en-trans: milü dön dang denpar jingyi lob

text.en: Though the world’s outer environment and its inner contents of beings and the like
text.en-trans: chinö jikten nangchü drowa sok

text.en: Are as impermanent as bubbles in water,
text.en-trans: mi tak chu yi buwa dang tsung kyang

text.en: Bound by tight grasping at permanence, we do not practice for death.
text.en-trans: chi chö mi drub tak dzin dampö ching

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to remember death wholeheartedly.
text.en-trans: chiwa nying né drenpar jingyi lob

text.en: Though the joys and sorrows of saṃsāra come down to karmic causality alone,
text.en-trans: sipé deduk lé dré khonar tuk

text.en: Having mistaken what to adopt and what to abandon,
text.en-trans: panglang nyi la langdor nor né kyang

text.en: We disregard the distinctions of cause and effect with empty talk and lofty boasts.
text.en-trans: gyundré khyé sé tong ké kha po to

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to examine cause and effect meticulously.
text.en-trans: gyundré bak lé zhibpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the realms of saṃsāra there is not a moment's happiness.
text.en-trans: khorwé né su dewa kechik mé

text.en: Though we desire happiness, we engage in actions that bring suffering,
text.en-trans: dewa dö kyang dukngal lé la tsön

text.en: Just like a moth trapped in a pit of fire.
text.en-trans: ché leb jizhin mé ob nang du gak

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to turn away from our attachment to saṃsāra.
text.en-trans: khorwar zhenpa lokpar jingyi lob

text.en: Though the Three Jewels are the chief sources of refuge,
text.en-trans: chok sum kyabné tsowo yin na ang

text.en: We fail to keep even just one of the precepts,
text.en-trans: labpé dompa na chik mi sung zhing

text.en: And engage in non-virtuous actions, amassing various faults and downfalls.
text.en-trans: mi gé lé tsön nyetung natsok sak

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to remember the qualities of the Three Jewels.
text.en-trans: könchok yönten drenpar jingyi lob

text.en: Though we possess the jewel of aspirational and applicational bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: mönjuk changsem norbu yö na yang

text.en: With little benefit to others, we stray into the rudra of dualistic clinging.
text.en-trans: zhenpen chungwé nyidzin rudrar gol

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chen ré zik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to generate the four immeasurables.
text.en-trans: tsemé nam zhi kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Thinking we lack self-grasping, we take pride in the two accumulations,
text.en-trans: dakdzin mé nyam tsok nyi khorlor lom

text.en: While under the grip of miserliness, we do not strive to accumulate merit,
text.en-trans: serna dampö tsok sak mi tsön zhing

text.en: And clutch so tightly to the merest teacup, we might die with clenched fists.
text.en-trans: ja por tsam la rangzhen shi bar tam

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us with the power to accumulate an abundance of merit.
text.en-trans: tsok sak gyacher nüpar jingyi lob

text.en: Thinking we lack misdeeds and obscurations, we hold our own projections to be empty,
text.en-trans: dikdrib mé nyam rangnang tongpar zung

text.en: But the burden of misusing food given in faith and offerings to the dead weighs heavy.
text.en-trans: dezé shin zé kor nak khurpo chi

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to generate the four powers in our minds.
text.en-trans: tob zhi gyü la kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Though we think our faith and pure view are impartial,
text.en-trans: depa daknang chokmé sam na yang

text.en: We are like prayer flags on a pole, blown about by the wind.
text.en-trans: jo dar lung gi kyö dang tsungpé na

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us with unflagging faith and devotion.
text.en-trans: dé mö tang lhö mepar jingyi lob

text.en: Failing to serve the guru endowed with threefold kindness
text.en-trans: tsawé lama kadrin sumden la

text.en: In the three ways that bring delight,
text.en-trans: nyepa sum gyi zhabtok mi drubpar

text.en: We accumulate boundless faults and downfalls through corrupting obscurations.
text.en-trans: lok drib wang gi tsammé nyetung sak

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to reach the highest perfection of pleasing the guru.
text.en-trans: nyepa pul du chinpar jingyi lob

text.en: Though the guru's mind and our mind should be undivided,
text.en-trans: lamé tuk dang rangsem yermé par

text.en: Receiving the four empowerments becomes subject to bias and distinctions.
text.en-trans: wang zhi langwa chok dang ri su ché

text.en: When wrong views arise and hinder the infusion of blessings,
text.en-trans: jinlab juk ka lokta kyé né kyang

text.en: We see the guru as an enemy and cast aspersions.
text.en-trans: lama dra tar tong né kurpa deb

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Even after the guru's blessings have infused our mind,
text.en-trans: lamé jinlab sem la juk né kyang

text.en: Bless us to see him or her as the Buddha in person.
text.en-trans: sangye ngö su tongwar jingyi lob

text.en: With lofty views like a spear moving freely through space,
text.en-trans: tawa tönpö namkha dung kor jé

text.en: We disregard cause and effect and stray into the empty talk of nihilism,
text.en-trans: gyundré khyé sé tong ké chetar gol

text.en: Engaging in misdeeds that cause our own and others’ ruin.
text.en-trans: rangzhen pung jé dikpé lé la tsön

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to see the faults of our own view.
text.en-trans: tawé rang kyön tongwar jingyi lob

text.en: We speak of meditation free from grasping and liberation into dharmakāya,
text.en-trans: gompa dzinmé chökur drol nyam shé

text.en: But are tightly bound to the tethering stake of fixation and attachment.
text.en-trans: até dzin zhen tö pur dampö zung

text.en: Unable to abandon the mind of cyclic existence, we strive in stages.
text.en-trans: khorwa lo yi mi tong rimgyi tsön

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to destroy the knots of dualistic clinging.
text.en-trans: zungdzin düpa zhikpar jingyi lob

text.en: The conduct of the great vehicle is a wish-fulfilling jewel,
text.en-trans: tekchen chöpa yizhin norbu la

text.en: Where whatever arises is naturally liberated without accepting or rejecting,
text.en-trans: gangshar rangdrol panglang mé na yang

text.en: But our narrow minds abandon the lesser vehicle and ethical discipline deteriorates.
text.en-trans: lochung tek men dor zhik tsultrim nyam

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to possess the three trainings.
text.en-trans: labpa sum dang denpar jingyi lob

text.en: What we take for intrinsic wisdom is hidden mental stirring in a blank state,
text.en-trans: rangjung yeshe kok gyu lung ma ten

text.en: Attached to experiences of luminosity and emptiness, we deceive ourselves.
text.en-trans: saltong nyam la zhen né rangnyi lü

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to realize intrinsic wisdom.
text.en-trans: rangjung yeshe tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: Though the path needs neither training nor effort, being spontaneously accomplished,
text.en-trans: lam la jong tsol mi gö lhündrub la

text.en: We are bound by intense dualistic clinging, attachment, aversion and anguish.
text.en-trans: nyidzin chakdang dung sem drakpö dam

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to never go astray on the path.
text.en-trans: lam la gol chuk dralwar jingyi lob

text.en: Fruition is the primordial state of Samantabhadra, luminous space,
text.en-trans: drebu kunzang gongpa ösal ying

text.en: The youthful vase body endowed with the six special qualities,
text.en-trans: khyechö drukden zhönnu bumpé ku

text.en: But without cutting the eight extremes, we remain caught by the five poisons.
text.en-trans: tröpé ta gyé ma chö duk ngé zin

text.en: We pray to you, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: Hold us in your compassion, Ārya Tārā.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik arya taré ma

text.en: Bless us to attain the royal throne of the four kāyas.
text.en-trans: ku zhi gyalsa zinpar jingyi lob

text.en: In short, may we —myself and all beings—
text.en-trans: dorna dak dang semchen tamché kyi

text.en: Turn our minds from saṃsāra, rely on authentic gurus,
text.en-trans: khorwar lo dok lama dampa ten

text.en: Undertake the three trainings,
text.en-trans: labpa sum dang tekpa soso yi

text.en: And each vehicle's distinctive sūtra and tantra teachings,
text.en-trans: do ngak zhungluk khyechö natsok sok

text.en: All of them in their entirety, without error, step by step,
text.en-trans: malü tamché manor rimzhin du

text.en: Accepting hardships and overcoming weariness,
text.en-trans: kawa dang lang ngalwa khyé sé né

text.en: Taking up the practice with intense diligence.
text.en-trans: dakchak tsöndrü drakpö nyam lang zhing

text.en: May the twofold benefit for ourselves and others be spontaneously accomplished,
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi lhün gyi drubpa dang

text.en: And having become the antidote to ignorance and the five poisons,
text.en-trans: marik duk ngé nyenpor gyur né kyang

text.en: May I become a suitable vessel for ripening and liberation.
text.en-trans: dak gyü mindrol nö du rungwar shok

text.en: When my mind-stream is liberated, for the benefit of others,
text.en-trans: ranggyü drol né zhenpen changsem la

text.en: Bless me to become equal to the Noble Ones themselves.
text.en-trans: pakpa nyi dang tsungpar jingyi lob

text.en: If by the power of the fierce winds of karma,
text.en-trans: galté lé lung drakpö tutsenpé

text.en: We fall under the power of ignorance and afflictive emotions,
text.en-trans: marik nyönmong wang du gyur na yang

text.en: May the supreme mother of the Victorious Ones, Noble Tārā,
text.en-trans: gyalwé yum chok pakma drolma yi

text.en: Bless the five poisons to arise as allies.
text.en-trans: duk nga drok su charwar jingyi lob

text.en: May all those with whom I have a connection, good or bad,
text.en-trans: dak la zang ngen drel tok malüpa

text.en: Gather in the Akaniṣṭha Potala realm in the future,
text.en-trans: chima womin po tala yi zhing

text.en: And at the Noble One's feet, inseparable from the Mother,
text.en-trans: ma dang yermé pakpé zhab drung du

text.en: Attain enlightenment together in a single assembly.
text.en-trans: tsombu chik tu ngönpar sangye shok
